channel.title: Preventing ::agility being used when in jail?

item.title: Preventing ::agility being used when in jail?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[code] if (playerCommand.equals(“agility”)) {
if (c.inWild() || c.inJail()) {
c.sendMessage(“You may not teleport at this time.”);

} else {
           
    	c.getPA().movePlayer(2474, 3437, 0);
    	c.sendMessage("You teleport to the Agility course.");
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Preventing ::agility being used when in jail?

          c.getPA().movePlayer(2474, 3437, 0);

item.title: Preventing ::agility being used when in jail?
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

How can i prevent people using a tele command (::agility which teleports you to the agility arena) when in jail or in wild

thanks

this is my command atm, it doesnt work when they are in deep wildy, but they can still use it in low level wildy which defeats the purpose of teleblock. my jail void is c.inJail()

if (playerCommand.equals("agility")) { if (c.inWild()) return; 
	        c.getPA().movePlayer(2474, 3437, 0);
			c.sendMessage("You teleport to the Agility course.");</blockquote>

Read full topic
item.source: Preventing ::agility being used when in jail?
